content: सरस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Juicy, succulent. {@--2@} Tasty, sapid. {@--3@} Wet; <ls>Śi. 11. 54.</ls> {@--4@} Wet with perspiration; <ls>Ku. 5. 85.</ls> {@--5@} Full of love, impassioned; <ls>Bv. 1. 100</ls> (where it means ‘full of honey’ also). {@--6@} Charming, lovely, agreeable, beautiful; सरसवसंते <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4. 8.</ls> {@--7@} Fresh, new, blooming; <ls>Māl. 9. 10.</ls> {@--8@} Expressive of poetical sentiment; see रस.
